prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that glows in the dark with a floating body and eerie expressions.
Imagine a mystical creature that resides in the shadows and has a flickering flame for a head.
Show me a spectral Pokemon with a mischievous grin and a flickering aura surrounding it.
Design a ghostly figure with a lantern-like appearance and a playful personality that haunts urban areas.
Generate a Pokemon that has a combination of dark and ethereal features, resembling a floating candle.
Give me an idea for a ghost-type Pokemon that uses its flame to guide lost souls through the night.
Make a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a haunted candle, with a mysterious aura and playful nature.
